SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Armor
The Armor class allows for equipable items that provide defense.
CustomException
A custom exception that is very basic for now
Health
The Health class is about consumable items that heal the user.
InventoryManager
Class that holds all of the items in stock, and allows for manipulating them.
Salable
This class is the base class to all purchasable items in this program.
ShoppingCart
The Shopping Cart of a Customer, contains logic for adding items to cart, removing them, and checking out
Storefront
This is the Storefront, the place where users will browse and purchased items.
Weapon
This class is used for creating any weapon (that can only harm virtual people).
